channel.description: Lessons covering Chapter 5: set notation, domain and range, functions, one-to-one functions, piecewise functions, function notation, and inverse functions. Lesson Topic 5A Set notation and sets of numbers 5B Relations, domain and range 5C Functions 5D One-to-one functions and implied domains 5E Piecewise-defined functions 5F Applying function notation 5G Inverse functions 5H Functions and modelling exercises
